DOC.detailed_description: The present study randomize control trial explore feasibility , acceptability , effectiveness short-term mindfulness training among adolescent . The primary purpose investigate effectiveness two main Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction components—sitting meditation hatha yoga—on work memory , stress , anxiety mindfulness . The influence daily home practice compliance intervention outcome also examine . Participants ( N = 198 adolescent ) recruit large public middle school southern California . Participants randomly assign sit meditation , hatha yoga , waitlist control group . Participants ask complete computerized work memory task , self-report measure perceive stress , anxiety , mindfulness pre- post-intervention/waitlist , well one-month follow-up . A series mixed-design analysis variance ( ANOVAs ) use examine change work memory , stress , anxiety , mindfulness group pre- post- intervention .
